data.lyric:
[ti:All In (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:All In (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]All In (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:00.13]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/Luke Clay/Brandon Russell/Michael O'Brien
[00:00.27]12Hunna on the beat
[00:09.67]Godd**n BJ made another one
[00:11.56]If I say how I feel you should really listen
[00:17.25]If you was all mine I'd be all in
[00:24.63]Came up outta that dirt pile now I'm ballin'
[00:27.47]And I don't need no church when I'm heaven-sent
[00:30.62]Hope God put loyalty in all my friends
[00:33.67]'Cause Lord knows I got they back to the end
[00:36.39]Right now I'm recordin' with the mic' sittin' in my hand
[00:39.28]I wish Three was on my left where my styrofoam is
[00:41.92]Got up out of Cypress went to the Woodlands
[00:43.55]Got a safe room in my crib
[00:44.93]Ain't no tellin' when I'ma have to use it we all know how I live
[00:48.03]Keepin' my gun everywhere I go we all know I'm still here
[00:50.96]Question my girl but love her strong we all know how that is
[00:53.98]Prayin' for my daddy to come home pray he get an appeal
[00:57.25]Hope he come take me away keep me from off of these pills
[01:00.16]And come get me from off of this drank before my kidney say "Fail"
[01:03.09]Tell my son it made me calm I don't know what I'm doin'
[01:05.74]Tell my girl these h*es can't make me cum
[01:07.58]I only want her to do it
[01:08.82]Ten lines straight goin' on ten days my body ain't got no fluid
[01:12.09]Please oh please don't die tryin' on the real
[01:18.04]All alone stalks and the shottas are unjudgemental
[01:20.94]It ain't too far right by the M up where they left my n***a
[01:24.38]Won't be that long yeah it'll be a while
[01:28.41]'Til my love life right again killas on side again
[01:31.71]Butterflies paradise them bullets left out the wind
[01:34.65]If I say how I feel you should really listen
[01:40.67]If you was all mine I'd be all in
[01:46.52]If I took the clean route bank accounts got cleaned out
[01:49.53]We would still be at war ridin' with the mobs tryna wipe the block down
[01:52.51].50 rounds at the bottom of that Glock stealin' from mom's house
[01:55.77]Steady screamin' "Gang life" know my time comin' 'round
[01:58.54]If I say how I feel you should really listen
[02:04.51]If you was all mine I'd be all in
[02:10.43]If I say how I feel you should really listen
[02:16.58]If you was all mine I'd be all in
[02:23.34]12Hunna on the beat
[02:32.94]Godd**n BJ made another one
data.trans:
[ti:All In (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:All In (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.27]12Hunna制作
[00:09.67]BJ Beatz制作
[00:11.56]如果你向你吐露心声 你应该侧耳倾听
[00:17.25]如果你是我的一切 我会全情投入
[00:24.63]我白手起家 如今我赚到盆满钵满
[00:27.47]我是上天派来的 我不需要去教堂告解
[00:30.62]希望上帝让我的朋友心怀忠诚
[00:33.67]因为上帝知道我让他们出人头地
[00:36.39]此刻我手里拿着麦克风 正在录音
[00:39.28]我希望装着那种东西的杯子放在左边
[00:41.92]从Cypress脱颖而出 去往Woodlands
[00:43.55]我的豪宅里有一间安全密室
[00:44.93]不知道何时会派上用场 我们都知道我过着刀光剑影的生活
[00:48.03]无论我走到哪里 我都枪不离身 我们都知道我威震四方
[00:50.96]对我的妹子心存怀疑 可我深爱着她 我们都知道来龙去脉
[00:53.98]祈祷我爸爸能回家 祈祷他有机会上诉
[00:57.25]希望他来带我离开 让我摆脱这些药
[01:00.16]在我肾脏衰竭以前 让我戒掉这些饮料
[01:03.09]告诉我的儿子 这让我平静下来 我不知道我在做什么
[01:05.74]告诉我的妹子 这些女人无法引起我的兴趣
[01:07.58]我只想与她纵享欢乐
[01:08.82]自我放纵 连续十天 我飘飘欲仙 毫无知觉
[01:12.09]求求你 请别舍生取义 现实一点
[01:18.04]独自一人 鬼鬼祟祟的人全副武装的歹徒无法判断
[01:20.94]并不难 我在他们抛弃我兄弟的地方挣了不少钱
[01:24.38]不会太久的 只是需要一段时间
[01:28.41]直到我的感情生活重获新生 再次大杀四方
[01:31.71]蝴蝶 天堂 子弹横飞
[01:34.65]如果你向你吐露心声 你应该侧耳倾听
[01:40.67]如果你是我的一切 我会全情投入
[01:46.52]如果我选择走正道 银行账户里会没有一分钱
[01:49.53]我们仍然过着枪林弹雨的生活 与兄弟一起并肩战斗 试图把街区清洗干净
[01:52.51]装满子弹的格洛克手枪 从妈妈的房子里偷出来
[01:55.77]大声呐喊 匪帮人生 我知道我的时代即将来临
[01:58.54]如果你向你吐露心声 你应该侧耳倾听
[02:04.51]如果你是我的一切 我会全情投入
[02:10.43]如果你向你吐露心声 你应该侧耳倾听
[02:16.58]如果你是我的一切 我会全情投入
[02:23.34]12Hunna制作
[02:32.94]BJ Beatz制作
